data.name: PEGGO!
data.detailed_description:
AS INTENSE AS BALLS CAN GET

PEGGO! is an incremental pachinko styled game with realistic physics. Drop tokens into the board to earn money, buy upgrades that earn you even more money, and repeat. With over 170 upgrades, abilities, skins, and prestige -- Prepare to become to PEGGO! Quintillionaire



BRING YOUR LEAST FAVORITE MOUSE

There are a ton of interactable buttons in PEGGO! you'll use to become an incremental millionaire. Tap and Click till your mouse catches fire to drop 1, 2, 4, 8, 16... balls at a time onto your board! PEGGO! features some intense clicking action to drop your pachinko balls, purchase upgrades, and activate awesome powerups! If you're tired of clicking, purchase some auto clickers that take the work load off and let you step away while the balls do the work themselves!


Become a Pro Clicker
  • Click to Drop
  • Upgrade Buttons
  • Powerup Buttons
  • And some secret clicks...



DROP BALLS LIKE A PRO

As you upgrade the board you'll not only increase the amount of pegs, but you'll also gain more slots for multipliers! Expand your board to include a dice multiplier, smaller PEGGO! board for additional multipliers, and some hidden secrets.


Upgrade your Board
  • More Pegs
  • Increased Multipliers Slots
  • Extra PEGGO! Board
  • Dice Rolling Multiplier



THE STRONGEST BALLS AROUND

Get some amazing powerups that help advance your PEGGO! board and reach incredible amounts of money. Turn every ball on the board into thousands of dollars, increase all multipliers, drop super valuable balls, and more! Stay vigilant because the countdown is always ticking down for the next time you can click.


Your Powerups
  • x10 Multiplier
  • All Tokens = 90k
  • Increase Global Multiplier
  • Million Dollar Coin

data.short_description: PEGGO! is an incremental pachinko-styled game with realistic physics. Drop tokens into the board to earn money, buy upgrades that earn you even more money, and repeat.
data.reviews:
“it has that addictive quality you want in this kind of game.”
Bennet Foddy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E5300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Broken Toaster
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Popin' Party PEGGO! Pulse x4500 Sound System
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E7300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Popin' Party PEGGO! Pulse x6500 Sound System

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Slackware
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E5300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: does not matter
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Mint 18.1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E7300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
